name: Fiddle Leaf Fig
description: The Fiddle Leaf Fig is a popular houseplant known for its large, violin-shaped leaves.

name: Snake Plant
description: The Snake Plant is a hardy indoor plant with long, upright leaves that are green with yellow edges.

name: Monstera Deliciosa
description: The Monstera Deliciosa, also known as the Swiss Cheese Plant, is famous for its large, split leaves.

name: Peace Lily
description: The Peace Lily is a popular indoor plant known for its elegant white flowers and glossy green leaves.

name: Aloe Vera
description: Aloe Vera is a succulent plant known for its medicinal properties and fleshy, green leaves.

name: Pothos
description: Pothos is an easy-to-care-for houseplant with trailing vines and heart-shaped leaves that are often variegated.

name: ZZ Plant
description: The ZZ Plant is a hardy indoor plant with waxy, oval leaves that grow on thick, fleshy stems.

name: Spider Plant
description: The Spider Plant is a popular houseplant known for its arching, grass-like leaves and spider-like offshoots.

name: Rubber Plant
description: The Rubber Plant is a large indoor plant known for its broad, glossy leaves that are dark green or burgundy.

name: Bird of Paradise
description: The Bird of Paradise is an exotic plant known for its striking flowers that resemble a bird in flight.
